tool_description:
Real-time data, unofficial API agoda.com.
The API provides search, booking for Hotels & Homes, Flights.
name: Agoda com
title: Agoda com

api_list.name: activities/detail
api_list.description:
activities/detail

The currency depends on the activity_token

api_list.name: activities/auto-complete
activities/get-prices
activities/search

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description:
Only allow one value, case-sensitive

`All`: All
`TourAndTrip`: Tours
`FoodAndDrinks`: Food
`Transportation`: Transportation
`IndoorActivities`: Indoor
`OutdoorActivities`: Outdoor
`EventExhibitionShow`: Events
`Attractions`: Attractions
`HealthAndWellness`: Health
`TravelEssentials`: Travel Essentials
`ArtDesignCulture`: Culture

optional_parameters.name: duration
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas, case-sensitive
`UpTo1Hour`: Up to 1 hour
`1To4Hour`: 1-4 hours
`4To24Hour`: 4-24 hours
`24To72Hour`:  24-72 hours
`MoreThan72Hour`: More than 72 hours

optional_parameters.name: star_rating
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas
`0`: No rating
`1`: 1 star
`2`: 2 stars
`3`: 3 stars
`4`: 4 stars
`5`: 5 stars

api_list.name: flights/one-way/search

required_parameters.name: flying_to
required_parameters.description:
if `search_type=Name` : Input city or airport name
if `search_type=Code`: Input `flying_code` from response of **flights/auto-complete** endpoint

required_parameters.name: flying_from
required_parameters.description:
if `search_type=Name` : Input city or airport name
if `search_type=Code`: Input `flying_code` from response of **flights/auto-complete** endpoint

optional_parameters.name: stops
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas
Values: 0,1,2

optional_parameters.name: duration
optional_parameters.description:
Unit: hours

Maximum duration refer to `data->filters->duration[index]->to` from response of **flights/one-way/get-filters** endpoint

OR `data->filters->duration[index]->to` from response of **this**

optional_parameters.name: airlines
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas
`data->filters->carriers[index]->id` from response of **flights/one-way/get-filters** endpoint
 OR `data->filters->carriers[index]->id` from response of **this**

optional_parameters.name: max_price
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum price refer to `data->filters->price[index]->to` from response of **flights/one-way/get-filters** endpoint

OR `data->filters->price[index]->to` from response of **this**

required_parameters.name: flying_from
required_parameters.description:
if `search_type=Name` : Input city or airport name
if `search_type=Code`: Input `flying_code` from response of **flights/auto-complete** endpoint

api_list.name: hotels-homes/day-use-stays/search
api_list.description: Search day use stays Hotels & Homes

optional_parameters.name: location_rating
optional_parameters.description:
Only allow one value

`matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=ReviewLocationScore** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint


`9`: Exceptional
`8`: Excellent
`7`: Very good

optional_parameters.name: property_type
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas

`matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=AccommodationType** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint


`34`: Hotel
`29`: Entire apartment
`37`: Resort
`120`: Serviced apartment
`32`: Guesthouse/bed and breakfast
`28`: Entire villa
`131`: Entire house
`122`: Resort villa
`33`: Hostel
`35`: Motel
`102`: Boat/cruise
`114`: Tent
`111`: Inn
`108`: Homestay
`112`: Lodge
`106`: Chalet
`89`: Family/child friendly

optional_parameters.name: distance_to_center
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas

`matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=CityCenterDistance** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint

`0`: Inside city center
`1`: smaller than 2 km to center
`2`: 2-5 km to center  
`3`: 5-10 km to center
`4`: >10 km to center

optional_parameters.name: popular_hotel_brands
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas

`matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=HotelChainId** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint

optional_parameters.name: star_rating
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas

`matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=StarRating** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint


`0`: No rating
`1`: 1 star
`2`: 2 stars
`3`: 3 stars
`4`: 4 stars
`5`: 5 stars

optional_parameters.name: bed_type
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas

 `matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=GroupedBedTypes** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint


`1`: Single/twin
`2`: Double
`4`: Queen
`5`: King
`7`: Bunk bed

optional_parameters.name: room_amenities
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas

`matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=RoomAmenities** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint


`86`: Refrigerator
`143`: Heating
`35`: TV
`47`: Coffee/tea maker
`37`: Bathtub
`25`: Air conditioning
`33`: Ironing facilities
`43`: Balcony/terrace
`87`: Washing machine
`42`: Kitchen
`31`: Internet access
`50`: Private pool
`342`: Pets allowed in room

optional_parameters.name: room_offers
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas

`matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=RoomBenefits** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint


`78322`: Breakfast included
`78310`: Early check-in
`78309`: Late check-out
`128283`: Outside food delivery allowed
`128281`: Delivery from family and relatives allowed
`128282`: \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"Delivery from nearby convenience store

optional_parameters.name: neighborhood
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas

`matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=HotelAreaId** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint

optional_parameters.name: beach_access
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas

`matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=BeachAccessTypeIds** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint


`1`: Private beach
`2`: Public beach

optional_parameters.name: deals_and_discounts
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas

`matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=Deals** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint

`81485`: 50% discount or more
`119520`: 2X AgodaCash
`81337`: Secret deals
`105046`: AgodaVIP Deals

optional_parameters.name: something_special
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas

`matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=TripPurpose** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint


`1`: Great for Groups
`2`: Great for Families
`3`: Workation Friendly
`4`: Pets Allowed

optional_parameters.name: child_ages
optional_parameters.description:
The child_ages multiple numbers values from 0 to 17, comma-separated, maximum of 9 items
Ex: 9,11

optional_parameters.name: guest_rating
optional_parameters.description:
Only allow one value

`matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=ReviewScore** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint


`9`: Exceptional
`8`: Excellent
`7`: Very good
`6`: Good

optional_parameters.name: number_of_bedrooms
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas

`matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=NumberOfBedrooms** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint

`0`: Studio
`1`: 1 bedroom
`2`: 2 bedrooms
`3`: 3+ bedrooms

optional_parameters.name: property_facilities
optional_parameters.description:
Allow multiple values separated by commas

`matrixItemResults->id` with **matrixGroup=HotelFacilities** from response of **hotels-homes/day-use-stays/get-filters** OR **this** endpoint

`93`: Swimming pool
`90`: Internet
`80`: Car park
`17`: Airport transfer
`92`: Gym/fitness
`116`: Front desk [24-hour]
`89`: Family/child friendly
`15`: Non-smoking
`91`: Spa/sauna
`11`: Restaurants
`83`: Smoking area
`24`: Pets allowed
`10`: Nightclub
`16`: Facilities for disabled guests
`88`: Business facilities
`56`: Golf course [on-site]

api_list.name: languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://agoda-com.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "agoda-com.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://agoda-com.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "agoda-com.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
